entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued August 05 at 10:03AM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Isolated Thunderstorms with Heavy Rain Through This Evening East of the Continental Divide... Higher than normal amounts of atmospheric moisture continue for areas east of the Continental Divide. Showers and thunderstorms in this area will have relatively high rainfall rates, and isolated flash flooding issues remain possible through this evening. Johnson
